original_title: 母の異常な愛情、ボクは犯●れています。 武田真
overview: Masato has been carefully raised as his only son since he was a child. But as Masato grows older, his mother "Makoto" leaves his hand, and his loneliness is hard to imagine from his mother. Motherhood was gradually distorted, and the destination was twisted sexuality ...
title: My Mother Has An Abnormal Love For Me, Because She's Always Raping Me Makoto Takeda
